title: Walnut Salad Dressing
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
instructions: In a small bowl, combine the mustard, vinegar, salt, and the pepper.  Add the vegetable and walnut oils in a slow, steady stream, whisking constantly, until well blended and emulsified.
source: The Colonial Williamsburg Tavern Cookbook, by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation, Recipes Developed by John R. Gonzales, Edited by Charles Pierce, Clarkson Potter/Publishers, New York, © 2001 by The Colonial Williamsburg Foundation.
